Posts.Content: annemarie wrote: I am due to start radiotherapy next week and am not sure what to expect. I intend to carry on working during the treatment which is 4 weeks, how have others coped? I have been told about skin problems and fatigue, but not sure yet how I will be affected Also I play tennis competitively will i be able to do this still. Can ayone give me any ideas? annemarie Dx 1/9/2008, ILC, 2cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, mets, ER+/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What to expect annemarie Barbie7
